name: Thalassa
declaringWar: I see, prepare to drown beneath the waves then.
attacked: Testing me I see? Don't underestimate the sea.
defeated: The oceans will roar once more, we shall bide our time.
introduction: Welcome to my kingdom human, may you bring mutual blessings.
neutralHello: What do you require of me?
neutralLetsHearIt: What do you seek of this?
neutralNo: I am not in the position to agree.
Your tricks will not get you as far as you think surface dweller.
neutralYes: I hope this is a right choice.
I trust that this is not a ploy human.
hateHello: If it isn't the surface apes.
hateLetsHearIt: Quickly, do not waste my time.
Asking for help? My my, trapped in a corner aren't you.
hateNo: The sharks will enjoy your flesh.
hateYes: I will cast aside my enmity for now.
afterPeace: Very well, the waves will halt this time.
We will cease, but do not expect me to weaken human.
tradeRequest: Trading seems appropriate don't you think?
uniques: Can embark and move over Coasts and Oceans immediately
Units pay only 1 movement point to embark and disembark
